Item.text: Well, Jordan, a good example would be a newspaper. A newspaper can inform us about what is going on in the world with articles that include facts.
Hi _user_, Good to see you here today.
Hi again _user_, Cristina what are we doing in this lesson?
well _user_ and jordan, we are going to be learning about texts with more than one purpose. They are called hybrids.
What kind of text would be a hybrid, Cristina?
it can also have advertisements that are meant to persuade us to buy something
With e-mail and with regular mail, we have tons of people writing us stuff for a variety of reasons.
Yes - my mailbox is always overflowing!
A lot of that mail has a hybrid of purposes and it can be really useful for us to try to understand the primary purpose for a writer to write something.
You mean like if it seems informative, but is actually trying to persuade us to buy something.
That way we can decide what we want to keep, to respond to, or to throw away. Let's look at some emails and think about why the writer wrote them!
_user_, thanks for joining us. I hope this made sense to you!
I think I understand. I see that most texts have hybrid purposes. A writer is able to do more than one thing in each text.

That's right. It is important for us to see the multiple purposes of the text, so that we can understand what the writer wants us to know, do, or believe. It also shapes the way we respond, especially to emails or letter.
I get that! Thanks, Cristina. See you next time _user_.
and it can have comics that are written to entertain us.
I see. When I think about it like that, I think most texts are hybrids.
That is a good point, Jordan. Most writer's have more than one reason for writing a text.
Maybe it would help to see some examples.

Sure. Today, we are going to look at some websites. Websites are a great example of hybrids. For each website, we will try to decide what the author's purposes are and we will support our predictions with text signals from the website. Let's get started.

Question.text: Since it is a hybrid, the website Friend book has more than one purpose.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The purposes of this website are to inform and entertain. A user of FriendBook wants to keep their friends informed about who they are and what they are doing. It also collects facts like birthdays. Additionally, some people use FriendBook as a way to make humorous remarks to entertain friends and family.
